chunks: • a4 Annexure A IN THE HON'BLE HIGH COURT OF KERALA AT ERNAKULAM (Original Jurisdiction ) In the matter of the Companies Act, 1956 and IN THE MATTER OF M/S. SEMIC ENGINEERS & CONTRACTORS (P) LIMITED (IN LIQUIDATION) C.P.N0.52/2002 and 47/2011 E-AUCTION NOTICE In pursuance of the Hon'ble High Court of Kerala order dated 11.4.2025 passed in Official Liquidator's Report No.87/2025, online competitive bids are hereby invited for sale of below described assets of the company (in Liquidation) situated at Cheranellur Village, Kanayannur Taluk, Ernakulam District on "AS IS WHERE IS AND WHATEVER THERE IS BASIS" through e-auction to be conducted by M/s.Railtel Corporation of India Ltd scheduled on 13.6.2025 from 14.00 hours to 17.00 hours. Lot Description of Assets EMD Upset price No. 1 Immovble assets to the extent of 33,50,000/- 3,35,00,000/- 82.13 ares (approx. 202.86 cents) in Survey Nos.732/1, 732/2 and 732 - 3- 2 (Block No.4 in Re- survey Nos.417/6,5,15, 419/2,4,7) including 2 villas and semi constructed villas therein situated in Cheranellur Village, Ernakulam District The entire e-auction catalogue i.e. "Terms and Conditions" of sale containing the schedules for giving full particulars of events of e-auction, guidelines for online registration, etc., are available on RailTel Corporation of India Ltd. website and can be viewed by clicking on "forth coming e- auction" or by accessing URL https://olauction.enivida.com and Ministry's website at www.mca.gov.in. Inspection ofthe assets can be had at the company premises situated at Cheranellur Village, Ernakulam District on 26.5.2025 between 10 a.m ..2/- ·-2-· . . to 4 p.m. The Official Liquidator subject to the orders of the Hon'ble High Court of Kerala reserves the right to accept or reject the highest offer and also put the assets for resale. The EMD as above need to be paid through online mode at least five days before the date of e-auction. The intending bidders may contact Sri.Gagan T.S., RailTel Corporation of India Ltd. on his Mobile No.8448288987/89, for doubts/clarifications, if any, on the e-auction procedure and Smt.Valsala. P, Official of the office of the Official Liquidator on her Mobile No. 8075028578 for other queries about the properties. Dated this 9th day of May, 2025 OFFICIA L QUIDATOR HIGH COU T F KERALA Corpo e Bhawan, 34 FIoor, B.M.C.Road, Thrikkakara P.O., Kochi - 21 Phone No.0484-2422889(O)
